descriptions.description: Launcher for applications Create a set of pages, each containing the desired applications. Preferences for customization in domain tool.applauncher.page: Create your own pages configuration key: page1(2,3,4...) format value: {'title':{'English':'Retail','French':'Vente'},'apps':['product-information','shop-orientation','loyalty-program','satisfaction-survey']} Preferences for customization in domain tool.applauncher: keys: - logo : changes the front page logo on tablet (ex: logoIMERIR.png) - behaviorNameDisplayed : 1 to show apps' name - attachedApplication : another app is displayed on tablet instead of the default page - conditionExpression : launch trigger condition for tablet to be displayed - dialogAlwaysRunning : boolean default False : bypass run_dialog and run the dialog automatically. Preferences you have to add in domain com.aldebaran.system.tablet: - MainActivity : image - MainResourceURL : http://198.18.0.1/apps/app-launcher/resources/background.jpg
